description: React component 'TrackList' renders a list of music tracks with metadata, including loading skeletons, track artwork, titles, artists, durations, and action buttons for playing and adding to playlists.

methods.name: TrackList({ tracks = [], loading = false, onPlay, onAddToPlaylist })
methods.description: Main functional React component for displaying a list of tracks with loading state and action handlers.

methods.name: formatDuration(sec)
methods.description: Helper function to convert duration in seconds to 'minutes:seconds' format.

ctags.name: TrackList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TrackList({ tracks = [], loading = false, onPlay, onAddToPlaylist }) {$/
